mapper.select: SELECT dl.department_line_id, dl.department_line_name, f.faculty_id, f.faculty_name, d.department_id, d.department_name FROM department_line dl INNER JOIN faculty f ON f.department_line_id = dl.department_line_id INNER JOIN department d ON d.faculty_id = f.faculty_id WHERE dl.department_line_id = #{departmentLineId}

SELECT d.semester, dl.department_line_name, f.faculty_name, d.department_name FROM department d INNER JOIN department_line dl ON d.department_line_id =dl.department_line_id INNER JOIN faculty f ON d.faculty_id = f.faculty_id WHERE d.department_line_id = #{departmentLineId} AND d.faculty_id = #{facultyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO insertDept(semester, department_line_name, faculty_name, department_name) VALUES (#{semester}, #{departmentLineName}, #{facultyName}, #{departmentName})

INSERT INTO REGISTER(REGISTER_CHANGE_ID, ST_ID, A_STATUS, R_DATE, GRADE, SEMESTER, REG_ST_NAME, REG_CHANGE_STATUS,DEPARTMENT_LINE_NAME,FACULTY_NAME,DEPARTMENT_NAME) VALUES (REG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{st_id},#{a_status},default,#{grade},#{semester},#{st_name},#{status},#{department_line_name},#{faculty_name},#{department_name})
